data.text: @JayT234 I do regret to read your unfortunate situation. Have you already file a Customer Care claim? If not yet, for unforeseen expenses due to a cancellation or a flight delay, you may request for possible compensation through this link: https://t.co/GlSCxuRM1P.

urls.title: Compensation and reimbursement for delay of your KLM flight - KLM United Kingdom
urls.description: Was your KLM flight cancelled, delayed, or rebooked? You may be entitled to compensation or reimbursement of unforeseen expenses. Check your options. - KLM United Kingdom
